rationaleHighlights: Airdrop (17%) to reward early adopters and expand community.
Ecosystem & Growth (20%) to fuel developer and partner incentives.
Team (13%) with multi-year vesting to retain contributors.
Liquidity (10%) and Staking (15%) to ensure trading and engagement stability.
